attribution: הספרייה הלאומית, מארכיון דן הדני. יוצר/ים: [יש לציין את שם היוצר/ים]. אם שם היוצר/ים אינו ידוע יש לציין: יוצר/ים: צוות יפפא The National Library of Israel, from Dan Hadani's Archive. Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: The Shalom AI-Israel Synagogue in Jericho may prove to be a future trouble flashpoint between Israeli settlers and the Palestinian police, On Thursday, 19 May 1994, Palestinian Police Chief General Nasser Yusef declared that "the Cairo agreement does not permit visiting this place with weapons, He later met with former Gaza commander IDF Brigadier-General Yomtov Samia and their meeting was devoted almost exclusively to this issue - but it remained nevertheless unresolved, The IDF said: "Since there are no guidelines [in the agreement], we can assume the settlers may continue to bring their weapons for the time being”.

sequences.label: The Shalom AI-Israel Synagogue in Jericho may prove to be a future trouble flashpoint between Israeli settlers and the Palestinian police  On Thursday  19 May 1994  Palestinian Police Chief General Nasser Yusef declared that "the Cairo agreement does not permit visiting this place with weapons  He later met with former Gaza commander IDF Brigadier-General Yomtov Samia and their meeting was devoted almost exclusively to this issue - but it remained nevertheless unresolved  The IDF said: "Since there are no guidelines [in the agreement]  we can assume the settlers may continue to bring their weapons for the time being”.
